communication
Class ReduceTask

java.lang.Object
  interfaces.Task
      communication.ReduceTask
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class ReduceTask
extends Task
implements java.io.Serializable

A message class that represents all information needed to carry out a reduce task by a worker node. This class is serializable.

See Also:
